title: Coordinate a Commercial Property Tour
description: A client wants to tour five different office spaces next Tuesday. The agent must create a logical tour schedule and coordinate with all listing brokers.

tasks.description: Get the list of five properties the client wants to see.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the list of target properties.

tasks.description: Map the properties and create a geographically logical tour route to minimize travel time.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates an efficient tour schedule (e.g., Property A at 10am, Property B at 11am, etc.).

tasks.description: Contact each listing broker to schedule the showing at the designated time and send a final itinerary to the client.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully books all five showings and provides a clear schedule to the client.
